data.name: OpenTelemetry Collector
data.description: A comprehensive overview of essential metrics related to the health and performance of OpenTelemetry Collector.

markdown.markdownText:
**OpenTelemetry Collector**

![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)

The OpenTelemetry Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the performance, availability, and reliability of your distributed systems. It integrates key telemetry data, including metrics, logs, and traces, to ensure proactive monitoring and troubleshooting of your application’s health. The dashboard is designed to highlight critical insights and support root cause analysis for performance bottlenecks and system issues.

**Details of integrations to bring in OpenTelemetry metrics - [OpenTelemetry](https://coralogix.com/docs/developer-portal/apis/data-ingestion/opentelemetry-custom-metrics/)**

**Use Cases Covered**

1. Receivers: Monitor data ingestion (accepted/refused records).
2. Processors: Track data processing (accepted, rejected, dropped records; batch size and sent batches).
3. Exporters: Evaluate data delivery (sent records, failures, queue size).
4. System Stats: Monitor resource usage (CPU, memory, network, filesystem).

More about performance monitoring of OpenTelemetry [here](https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector/tree/main/otelcol)

widgets.title: Receiver Accepted Log Record Host Count
Receiver Accepted Log Record Removed Host Count

promqlQuery.value: count(count by (k8s_node_name)(count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"} offset 1d ))) unless count(count by (k8s_node_name) (count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"})))

widgets.title: Receiver Accepted Metric Removed Host Count

promqlQuery.value: count(count by (k8s_node_name)(count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"}[${__range}] offset 1d ))) unless count(count by (k8s_node_name) (count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"}[${__range}])))

promqlQuery.value: count(count by (k8s_node_name)(count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"}[${__range}] offset 1d ))) unless count(count by (k8s_node_name) (count_over_time(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans_total{cloud_account_id=~"{{cloud_account_id}}",cloud_region=~"{{cloud_region}}",receiver=~"{{receiver}}",cloud_provider=~"{{cloud_provider}}",net_host_name=~"{{net_host_name}}"}[${__range}])))
